# Zoning Evaluation Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1290 TTY 711

__

dpzzed@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Pkwy., Suite 801  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Suzanne Wright  
Director

# Zoning Application Weekly Status Reports

## Applications Received Weekly

The Applications Received Weekly report lists all zoning applications received for the week immediately preceding the current week. This report contains information as submitted by applicants that has not yet been reviewed by staff. Runs automatically on Sundays. 

View Applications Received Weekly Report in PLUS

## Applications Accepted Weekly

The Applications Accepted Weekly report lists all zoning applications accepted in the week prior to the current week. These reports run automatically on a weekly schedule. Reports are sorted by magisterial district and include the following information: applicant, CRD status, date accepted, area, tax maps, existing zoning, location description, and application description.

View Applications Accepted Weekly Report in PLUS

## Related Resources

Zoning District Acronym List
